questions.question_text: Which two NSX Data Security roles could be assigned to view configured policies and violation reports? (Choose two.)

You are creating a Universal Segment ID Pool for a three site Cross-vCenter environment.
The three sites are designated as Site A, Site B and Site C,
* Site A has a local Segment ID pool of 5000-5999
* Site B has a local Segment ID pool of 6000-6999
* Site C has a local Segment ID pool of 7000-7999
Which of the following ranges would be valid for the Universal Segment ID pool?

discussion.content: D. 2000000-2000999 (range must not overlap and inbetween 5000-16777215)

questions.question_text: Which two are accurate statements with regards to Guest Introspection installation? (Choose two.)

choices.A: The service virtual machine performs data security and activity monitoring.
choices.D: Guest Introspection is deployed with NSX Data Security by default.
choices.B: The installation deploys a virtual machine to hosts prepared for VMware NSX.
choices.C: A security policy weight of 4300 is assigned to hosts prepared to Guest Introspection.

questions.question_text: Which three services could be provided by an NSX Edge Service Gateway? (Choose three.)

discussion.content: It should be C. SNAT as you need to translate from private ip to public ip, you are natting the source ip

C. SNAT
A client Inside LAN and behind Firewall wanted to browse Internet https://ipwithease.com/snat-vs-dnat/
Direct access from the internet to these virtual machines is NOT permitted, that means, the VM can access from Internet, SO i feel DNAT
Outbound NAT only, SNAT is the way to go...
